bronze:SpreadShot.NAME: Spread Shot
bronze:SpreadShot.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

bronze:DeferProcess.NAME: Defer Process
bronze:DeferProcess.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Next turn, gain [E].

bronze:StackOverflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Shield. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Core.

bronze:Barrage.NAME: Barrage
bronze:Barrage.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster.

bronze:ShiningCore.NAME: Shining Core

bronze:QuadCore.NAME: Quad Core
bronze:QuadCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain [E]. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].

bronze:Subroutine.NAME: Subroutine
bronze:Subroutine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next card you bronze:Fire costs 0.

bronze:PrepDefense.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Reserve *Guard into your hand.

bronze:ReserveGuard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Shield. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Goto.NAME: Goto
bronze:Goto.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL bronze:Fire the top card of your draw pile.

bronze:LockOn.NAME: Lock-On

bronze:DupeCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain [E]. NL The next card you bronze:Fire is bronze:Repeated.
bronze:DupeCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Gain [E]. NL The next card you bronze:Fire is bronze:Repeated.

bronze:SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL If bronze:Fired: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
bronze:SuppressiveFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

bronze:AutoTurret.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, bronze:Repeat X *Peashooters.
bronze:AutoTurret.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Refund 1. NL At the start of your turn, bronze:Repeat X *Peashooters.

bronze:TriBeam.NAME: Tri-Beam
bronze:TriBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Fire 2 bronze:Blasters.

bronze:MentalMap.NAME: Mental Map
bronze:MentalMap.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!. NL Return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.

bronze:Flail.NAME: Flail
bronze:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.
